thread.title: Mumbai property prices headed for a massive crash?
thread.title_full: Mumbai property prices headed for a massive crash?

title: Mumbai property prices headed for a massive crash?
text: Mumbai property prices headed for a massive crash? 09 Aug 2015, 9:27AM IST Copy URL Embed With inventory buildup rising faster than sales and interest payout increasing, pressure is rising on builders to cut property prices in Mumbai. One recent report claims that property prices in the city could come down by about 50%. In this issue of The Property Guide, we debate if such a scenario is indeed possible. For the latest videos, follow us on twitter Follow @EconomicTimes 83 views
